English Sentences: And ye have this day rejected your God, who himself saved you out of all your adversities and your tribulations; and ye have said unto him, Nay, but set a king over us. Now therefore present yourselves before the LORD by your tribes, and by your thousands.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin hachchi intte metuwaappenne waayiyaappe ubbaappe inttena ashshiya intte Xoossaa ixxideta; ixxidi, CHii! Nu bolli kawo kawoya yaagideta. Hegaa gishshau, ha77i intte intte zariyaaninne intte yaran gididi, GODAA sintti aadhdhite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when Samuel had caused all the tribes of Israel to come near, the tribe of Benjamin was taken.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaayyo Sameeli Israa7eela zare ubbaa aattin, saamai Biniyaama zariyan wodhdhiis.

English Sentences: When he had caused the tribe of Benjamin to come near by their families, the family of Matri was taken, and Saul the son of Kish was taken: and when they sought him, he could not be found.
Wolaitta Sentences: Biniyaama zariyaa yaran yaran aattin, saamai Maaxira yaran wodhdhiis; wurssettan Qiisa na7ai Saa7ooli doorettiis. Eti a koyidosona; shin i beettibeenna.

English Sentences: Therefore they enquired of the LORD further, if the man should yet come thither. And the LORD answered, Behold, he hath hid himself among the stuff.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau eti GODAA, "Biron ha sohuwaa yaana asi de7ii?" yaagidi oichchidosona. Oichchin GODAI, "Ee! Saa7ooli miishshatu giddon qosetti uttiis" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they ran and fetched him thence: and when he stood among the people, he was higher than any of the people from his shoulders and upward.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti woxxi biidi, yaappe a kessi ehiidosona. Asaa giddon i eqqiyo wode, hasheppe qommo baggan asa ubbaappe aduqqees.

English Sentences: And Samuel said to all the people, See ye him whom the LORD hath chosen, that there is none like him among all the people? And all the people shouted, and said, God save the king.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sameeli asa ubbaayyo, "GODAI doorido bitaniyaa be7eetii? Ha asaa giddon a milatiyaabi ooninne tumu baawa" yaagiis. Yaagin asai ubbai ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi, "Kawoi shemppo gam77o" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then Samuel told the people the manner of the kingdom, and wrote it in a book, and laid it up before the LORD. And Samuel sent all the people away, every man to his house.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Sameeli kawotettaa wogaa asaayyo yootiis; xaaxettiya maxaafan he wogaa xaafidi, GODAA sinttan wottiis. Yaatidi Sameeli asa ubbaa huuphiyan huuphiyan a soo a soo yeddiis.

English Sentences: And Saul also went home to Gibeah; and there went with him a band of men, whose hearts God had touched.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saa7oolikka ba soo Gib77a biis; Xoossai eta wozanaa bochchido mino asati Saa7oolaara biidosona.

English Sentences: But the children of Belial said, How shall this man save us? And they despised him, and brought him no presents. But he held his peace.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin issi issi pattenna asati, "Ha bitanee nuna waatidi ashshanee?" yaagidosona; eti a karidi, ayyo ainne imota immibookkona. SHin Saa7ooli co77u giis.

English Sentences: Then Nahash the Ammonite came up, and encamped against Jabeshgilead: and all the men of Jabesh said unto Nahash, Make a covenant with us, and we will serve thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi aginaappe guyyiyan, Amoona biittaa Kawoi Naa7oosi denddidi, Gala7aaden de7iya Yaabeesha katamaa dooddidi uttiis. Uttin Yaabeesha asai ubbai a, "Neeni nunaara maachchaa wotta; nuuni neeyyo haarettana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Nahash the Ammonite answered them, On this condition will I make a covenant with you, that I may thrust out all your right eyes, and lay it for a reproach upon all Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Naa7oosi, "Taani issibaa oottanau intte eeno giikko, inttenaara maachchaa wottana; hegeenne, taani intteyyo ubbaayyo ushachcha aifiyaa woocada kessana; yaatada Israa7eela ubbaa kaushshana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the elders of Jabesh said unto him, Give us seven days' respite, that we may send messengers unto all the coasts of Israel: and then, if there be no man to save us, we will come out to thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaabeesha cimati ubbai Naa7oosa, "Israa7eela biitta ubbau nuuni kiitaa yeddana mala, laappun gallassaa takkashsharkkii; nuna ashshiyaabi ooninne xayikko, nuuni neeyyo kushiyaa immana" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Then came the messengers to Gibeah of Saul, and told the tidings in the ears of the people: and all the people lifted up their voices, and wept.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kiitettidaageeti Saa7ooli de7iyoosaa Gib77aa biidi, ha yohuwaa asaayyo yootidosona; yootin asai ubbai ba qaalaa xoqqissidi yeekkiis.

English Sentences: And, behold, Saul came after the herd out of the field; and Saul said, What aileth the people that they weep? And they told him the tidings of the men of Jabesh.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode Saa7ooli ba boorata laaggidi goshshaappe yiyaagee, "Asai waanidee? Aibissi yeekkii?" yaagidi oichchiis; oichchin Yaabeesha asai giidobaa ayyo yootidosona.

English Sentences: And the Spirit of God came upon Saul when he heard those tidings, and his anger was kindled greatly.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha qaalaa Saa7ooli siyido wode, Xoossaa Ayyaanai a bollan wolqqan wodhdhiis; Saa7ooli hanqquwaa suulliis.

English Sentences: And he took a yoke of oxen, and hewed them in pieces, and sent them throughout all the coasts of Israel by the hands of messengers, saying, Whosoever cometh not forth after Saul and after Samuel, so shall it be done unto his oxen. And the fear of the LORD fell on the people, and they came out with one consent.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saa7ooli waaxa boorata ekki muxerettidi, kiitettidaageetun Israa7eela biitta ubbau yeddiiddi, "Saa7oolanne Sameela kaallidi, kiyenna o booratinne hagaadan muxettana" yaagiis. Hegaappe guyyiyan, GODAA dagamai asaa bolli wodhdhin, eti issi asadan kiyidosona.

English Sentences: And when he numbered them in Bezek, the children of Israel were three hundred thousand, and the men of Judah thirty thousand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saa7ooli Bezeeqan eta shiishshidi qoodido wode, Israa7eela asai heezzu xeetu sha7a; Yihudaa asai hasttamu sha7a.

English Sentences: And they said unto the messengers that came, Thus shall ye say unto the men of Jabeshgilead, To morrow, by that time the sun be hot, ye shall have help. And the messengers came and shewed it to the men of Jabesh; and they were glad.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti kiitetti yiidaageeta hagaadan yaagidosona; "Biidi Yaabeesha Gala7aade asatuyyo, Wontto xalqqee michchiyo wode, nuuni inttena ashshana yaagidi yootite" yaagidosona. Kiitettidaageeti biidi, Yaabeesha asatuyyo hegaa yootidosona; yootin eti keehi ufaittidosona.

English Sentences: Therefore the men of Jabesh said, To morrow we will come out unto you, and ye shall do with us all that seemeth good unto you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaabeesha asati Amoona asatuyyo, "Nuuni wontto intteyyo kushiyaa immana; intte nuna dosiyoogaadan oottana danddayeeta" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And it was so on the morrow, that Saul put the people in three companies; and they came into the midst of the host in the morning watch, and slew the Ammonites until the heat of the day: and it came to pass, that they which remained were scattered, so that two of them were not left together.
Wolaitta Sentences: Wonttetta gallassi Saa7ooli ba asaa heezzu citan shaakkiis; eti sa7ai wonttiyo wode, Amoona asati galchchidosaa gelidi, xalqqee michchana gakkanaassi Amoona asata goora7idosona; goora7aappe attidaageeti naa77u asi issippe de7ennaadan ubbai bau bau laalettiis.

English Sentences: And the people said unto Samuel, Who is he that said, Shall Saul reign over us? bring the men, that we may put them to death.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Israa7eela asai Sameela, " Saa7ooli nu bolli kawotanee? yaagida asati oonee? Eti oonakko kessite; nuuni eta worana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Saul said, There shall not a man be put to death this day: for to day the LORD hath wrought salvation in Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Saa7ooli eta, "Issi asinne hachchi haiqqenna; aissi giikko, GODAI Israa7eela wotti ekkido gallassai hachcha" yaagidi zaariis.

English Sentences: Then said Samuel to the people, Come, and let us go to Gilgal, and renew the kingdom there.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Sameeli asaa, "Haayite; Gelggali boos; biidi yan Saa7ooli kawo gidiyoogaa zaarettidi erissoos" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And all the people went to Gilgal; and there they made Saul king before the LORD in Gilgal; and there they sacrificed sacrifices of peace offerings before the LORD; and there Saul and all the men of Israel rejoiced greatly.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, asati ubbai Gelggali biidi, Gelggalan, GODAA sinttan Saa7ooli kawo gidiyoogaa erissidosona. Yan sarotettaa yarshshuwaa GODAA sinttan yarshshidosona; Saa7oolinne Israa7eela asai ubbai he sohuwan xoonuwaa baalaa gita ufaissan bonchchidosona.

English Sentences: And Samuel said unto all Israel, Behold, I have hearkened unto your voice in all that ye said unto me, and have made a king over you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Sameeli Israa7eela ubbaa hagaadan yaagiis; "Intte taayyo yootido ubbabaa taani siyada, intte bolli kawuwaa kawoyaas.

English Sentences: And now, behold, the king walketh before you: and I am old and grayheaded; and, behold, my sons are with you: and I have walked before you from my childhood unto this day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha77i simmi inttena kaalettanau kawoi de7ees. Tana gidikko, taani daro de7aasinne cimaas; ta naati inttenaara de7oosona. Taani ta yelagatettaasappe hachchi gakkanaashin inttena kaalettaas.

English Sentences: Behold, here I am: witness against me before the LORD, and before his anointed: whose ox have I taken? or whose ass have I taken? or whom have I defrauded? whom have I oppressed? or of whose hand have I received any bribe to blind mine eyes therewith? and I will restore it you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hekko taani hagan eqqaas; GODAA sinttaaninne i tiyido kawuwaa sinttan ta bolli markkattite. Taani o boora ekkidanaa? O hare ekkidanaa? Oona cimmidanaa? Oona huqqunnidanaa? Ta aifiyaa qooqissanau o kushiyaappe mattaaye miidanaa? Hageetuppe issuwaanne taani oottidobaa gidikko, taani qanxxana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they said, Thou hast not defrauded us, nor oppressed us, neither hast thou taken ought of any man's hand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin eti zaaridi, "Neeni nuna cimmabaakka; woikko nuna huqqunnabaakka; neeni asa kushiyaappe aibanne mattaaye mabaakka" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And he said unto them, The LORD is witness against you, and his anointed is witness this day, that ye have not found ought in my hand. And they answered, He is witness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sameeli eta, "Intte ta kushiyan aibanne demmibeennaagau GODAINNE i tiyido kawoinne hachchi intte bollan markka" yaagiis. Etikka, "Ee, i markka" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And Samuel said unto the people, It is the LORD that advanced Moses and Aaron, and that brought your fathers up out of the land of Egypt.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sameeli asaa, "Musanne Aaroona dooridaageenne intte aawata Gibxxeppe kessidaagee GODAA.

English Sentences: Now therefore stand still, that I may reason with you before the LORD of all the righteous acts of the LORD, which he did to you and to your fathers.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha77i simmi intteyyoonne intte aawatuyyo GODAI oottido xillo oosuwau ubbau taani inttenaara GODAA sinttan mootettanaadan, hagan eqqite.

English Sentences: When Jacob was come into Egypt, and your fathers cried unto the LORD, then the LORD sent Moses and Aaron, which brought forth your fathers out of Egypt, and made them dwell in this place.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaaqoobinne a so asai Gibxxe biidi de7ishin, Gibxxe asati eta naaqqido wode, intte aawati GODAAYYO waassidosona; waassin GODAI Musanne Aaroona kiittiis; eti intte aawata Gibxxeppe kessidi, hagan wottidosona.

English Sentences: And when they forgat the LORD their God, he sold them into the hand of Sisera, captain of the host of Hazor, and into the hand of the Philistines, and into the hand of the king of Moab, and they fought against them.
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin Israa7eela asati GODAA bantta Xoossaa dogidosona; dogin GODAI eta Haxoora olanchchatu gadaawaa Sisaara kushiyan, Pilisxxeema asatu kushiyaaninne Moo7aaba kawuwaa kushiyan aattidi immiis; aattidi immin eta olidosona.

English Sentences: And they cried unto the LORD, and said, We have sinned, because we have forsaken the LORD, and have served Baalim and Ashtaroth: but now deliver us out of the hand of our enemies, and we will serve thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti GODAAYYO, Nuuni nagaraa oottida; nuuni GODAA aggidi, Ba7aalayyoonne Asttaarootiyyo goinnida. SHin ha77i neeni nuna nu morkketu kushiyaappe ashsha; nuuni neeyyo goinnana yaagidi waassidosona.

English Sentences: And the LORD sent Jerubbaal, and Bedan, and Jephthah, and Samuel, and delivered you out of the hand of your enemies on every side, and ye dwelled safe.
Wolaitta Sentences: Waassin GODAI Geedoona, Baaraaqa, Yofttaahanne Sameela kiittidi, intte yuusho ubban de7iya morkketu kushiyaappe inttena ashshiis; yaatin, intte saro de7ideta.

English Sentences: And when ye saw that Nahash the king of the children of Ammon came against you, ye said unto me, Nay; but a king shall reign over us: when the LORD your God was your king.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Amoona asatu Kawoi Naa7oosi inttekko yiidoogaa be7ido wode, GODAI intte Xoossai intte kawo gidikkokka, intte tana, CHii, nuuni nuna haaranau kawo koyoos yaagideta.

English Sentences: Now therefore behold the king whom ye have chosen, and whom ye have desired! and, behold, the LORD hath set a king over you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha77ikka intte dooridi oichchido kawoi hageeho! Be7ite; GODAI intte bolli kawuwaa wottiis.

English Sentences: If ye will fear the LORD, and serve him, and obey his voice, and not rebel against the commandment of the LORD, then shall both ye and also the king that reigneth over you continue following the LORD your God:
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAAYYO intte yayyikko, ayyo kiitettikko, a qaalaayyo azazettikko, a azazuwaayyo makkalennan aggikkonne inttekka intte bolli kawotiya kawoikka GODAA intte Xoossaa kaallikko, yaatikko lo77o.

English Sentences: But if ye will not obey the voice of the LORD, but rebel against the commandment of the LORD, then shall the hand of the LORD be against you, as it was against your fathers.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin GODAA qaalaayyo intte azazettennan ixxikkonne a azazuwaayyo makkalikko, GODAA pirddai kase intte aawatu bolli yiidoogaadan, intte bollikka yaana.

English Sentences: Now therefore stand and see this great thing, which the LORD will do before your eyes.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Simmi ha77i eqqi bayite; GODAI intte aifiyaa sinttan oottiyo ha gitabaa be7ite!

English Sentences: Is it not wheat harvest to day? I will call unto the LORD, and he shall send thunder and rain; that ye may perceive and see that your wickedness is great, which ye have done in the sight of the LORD, in asking you a king.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gisttiyaa cahaa wodee ha77a gidenneeyye? GODAI dadaanne iraa yeddana mala, taani GODAAYYO waassana. Yaaniyaabaa gidikko, kawuwaa intte oichchidoogee GODAA sinttan gita iitatetta gidiyoogaa intte erananne be7ana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: So Samuel called unto the LORD; and the LORD sent thunder and rain that day: and all the people greatly feared the LORD and Samuel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sameeli GODAAYYO waassiis; GODAI he gallassi dadaanne iraa yeddiis; hegaa gishshau, asai ubbai GODAANNE Sameela keehippe yayyiis.

English Sentences: And all the people said unto Samuel, Pray for thy servants unto the LORD thy God, that we die not: for we have added unto all our sins this evil, to ask us a king.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai ubbai Sameela, "Nuuni kawuwaa oichchidi, nu nagaraa ubbaa bolli ha iitatettaa gujjido gishshau, nuuni ne ashkkarati haiqqennaadan nuuyyo GODAA ne Xoossaa woossarkkii" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Samuel said unto the people, Fear not: ye have done all this wickedness: yet turn not aside from following the LORD, but serve the LORD with all your heart;
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Sameeli asaayyo hagaadan yaagiis; "Yayyoppite; tumakka intte ha iitatetta ubbaa oottideta; shin intte kumetta wozanaappe GODAAYYO kiitettiteppe attin, a kaalliyoogaa aggoppite.

English Sentences: And turn ye not aside: for then should ye go after vain things, which cannot profit nor deliver; for they are vain.
Wolaitta Sentences: Maaddenna, ashshennanne pattenna eeqata kaalloppite; aissi giikko, hegee pattennabaa.

English Sentences: For the LORD will not forsake his people for his great name's sake: because it hath pleased the LORD to make you his people.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI ba gita sunttaa gishshau ba asaa aggenna; aissi giikko, i inttena ba asa oottanau ufaittees.

English Sentences: Moreover as for me, God forbid that I should sin against the LORD in ceasing to pray for you: but I will teach you the good and the right way:
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte gishshau woossiyoogaa aggada GODAA bolli nagaraa oottanaagee taappe haakko; taani inttena lo77onne suure ogiyaa tamaarissana.

English Sentences: Only fear the LORD, and serve him in truth with all your heart: for consider how great things he hath done for you.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAAYYO yayyite; intte kumetta wozanaappe ammanettidi, ayyo kiitettite; intteyyo i oottido gitabaa hassayite.

English Sentences: But if ye shall still do wickedly, ye shall be consumed, both ye and your king.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin intte iitabaa zaari zaaridi oottikko, inttekka intte kawoikka xayana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Saul reigned one year; and when he had reigned two years over Israel,
Wolaitta Sentences: Saa7ooli Israa7eela bolli naa77u laittaa kawotidoogaappe guyyiyan,

English Sentences: Saul chose him three thousand men of Israel; whereof two thousand were with Saul in Michmash and in mount Bethel, and a thousand were with Jonathan in Gibeah of Benjamin: and the rest of the people he sent every man to his tent.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eelatu giddoppe heezzu asaa dooriis; naa77u sha7ai Mikimaasan, Beeteele gezziyan Saa7oolaara de7ees; issi sha7ai qassi Biniyaaman de7iya Gib77an Yonaataanaara de7ees; attida asaa Saa7ooli eta soo soo yeddiis.

English Sentences: And Jonathan smote the garrison of the Philistines that was in Geba, and the Philistines heard of it. And Saul blew the trumpet throughout all the land, saying, Let the Hebrews hear.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yonaataani Gebaa7an de7iya Pilisxxeema olanchchatu citaa bolli woraajjiis; Pilisxxeema asati hegaa siyidosona. Hegaappe guyyiyan Saa7ooli, "Ibraaweti hagaa siyona" giidi, biittaa ubban malkkataa punissiis.

English Sentences: And all Israel heard say that Saul had smitten a garrison of the Philistines, and that Israel also was had in abomination with the Philistines. And the people were called together after Saul to Gilgal.
Wolaitta Sentences: Punissin Israa7eela asai ubbai, "Saa7ooli Pilisxxeema olanchchatu citaa bolli woraajjiis; woraajjin ha77i Israa7eela asai Pilisxxeema asaassi sheneyiyaabaa gidiis" yaagiyo oduwaa siyiis. Siyidi asai Saa7oolakko Gelggala xeesettidi shiiqiis.

English Sentences: And the Philistines gathered themselves together to fight with Israel, thirty thousand chariots, and six thousand horsemen, and people as the sand which is on the sea shore in multitude: and they came up, and pitched in Michmash, eastward from Bethaven.
Wolaitta Sentences: Pilisxxeema asati Israa7eelata olanau hasttamu sha7u para gaaretuura, usuppun sha7u paraasatuuranne abbaa doonan de7iya shafiyaa keena olanchchatuura shiiqidosona; eti pude biidi, Beeti-Aweenappe arshsho baggaara de7iya Mikimaasan galchchidosona.

English Sentences: When the men of Israel saw that they were in a strait, (for the people were distressed,) then the people did hide themselves in caves, and in thickets, and in rocks, and in high places, and in pits.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela olanchchati banttau leelidoogaanne eta citaikka keehippe un77ettidoogaa be7idi, gonggoluwaa giddon, buuraa giddon, zaallatu giddon, kakaa giddooninne haattau bookko ollaa giddon qosettidosona.

English Sentences: And some of the Hebrews went over Jordan to the land of Gad and Gilead. As for Saul, he was yet in Gilgal, and all the people followed him trembling.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ibraawetuppe aramidaageeti Yorddaanoosa SHaafaa pinnidi, Gaadanne Gala7aade biitti biidosona. SHin Saa7ooli Gelggalan attiis; aara de7iya olanchchati ubbai yashshau kokkoridosona.

English Sentences: And he tarried seven days, according to the set time that Samuel had appointed: but Samuel came not to Gilgal; and the people were scattered from him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saa7ooli Sameeli keerido laappun gallassaa gam77iis; shin Sameeli Gelggali yibeenna; yaatin, Saa7oola asai laalettiyoogaa doommiis.

English Sentences: And Saul said, Bring hither a burnt offering to me, and peace offerings. And he offered the burnt offering.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Saa7ooli, "Xuuggiyo yarshshuwaanne issippetettaa yarshshuwaa taayyo hammite" yaagiis; ehin Saa7ooli xuuggiyo yarshshuwaa yarshshiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, that as soon as he had made an end of offering the burnt offering, behold, Samuel came; and Saul went out to meet him, that he might salute him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saa7ooli xuuggiyo yarshshuwaa polosaarakka Sameeli gakki wodhdhiis. Yaatin, Saa7ooli Sameela mokkanau kare kiyiis.

English Sentences: And Samuel said, What hast thou done? And Saul said, Because I saw that the people were scattered from me, and that thou camest not within the days appointed, and that the Philistines gathered themselves together at Michmash;
Wolaitta Sentences: Sameeli Saa7oola, "Hagee neeni oottidoogee aibee?" yaagiis. Yaagin Saa7ooli, "Asai laalettiyoogaa, neenikka giido wode yabeennaagaanne Pilisxxeemati Mikimaasan shiiqidoogaa taani be7ada,

English Sentences: Therefore said I, The Philistines will come down now upon me to Gilgal, and I have not made supplication unto the LORD: I forced myself therefore, and offered a burnt offering.
Wolaitta Sentences: Pilisxxeemati tanaara olettanau ha77i Gelggala wodhdhana; taani GODAA maaduwaa oichchabeikke; hegaa gishshau, xuuggiyo yarshshuwaa taani yarshshanau koshshees gaada qoppaas" yaagidi zaariis.

English Sentences: And Samuel said to Saul, Thou hast done foolishly: thou hast not kept the commandment of the LORD thy God, which he commanded thee: for now would the LORD have established thy kingdom upon Israel for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sameeli Saa7oola, "Neeni eeyabaa oottadasa; GODAI ne Xoossai neeyyo immido azazuwaa naagabaakka. Naagidaakko GODAI hachchi ne kawotettaa Israa7eela bolli merinau minttanaagaashin.

English Sentences: But now thy kingdom shall not continue: the LORD hath sought him a man after his own heart, and the LORD hath commanded him to be captain over his people, because thou hast not kept that which the LORD commanded thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Simmi ha77i ne kawotettai gam77enna; neeni GODAA azazuwaa naagabeenna gishshau, GODAI ba wozanaadan oottiya asa koyiis; koyidi a ba asaa haaranaadan sunttiis" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Samuel arose, and gat him up from Gilgal unto Gibeah of Benjamin. And Saul numbered the people that were present with him, about six hundred men.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Sameeli Gelggalappe denddidi, Biniyaaman de7iya Gib77aa biis. Bin Saa7ooli banaara de7iya asaa qoodiis; qoodin asai usuppun xeetu keena gidiis.

English Sentences: And Saul, and Jonathan his son, and the people that were present with them, abode in Gibeah of Benjamin: but the Philistines encamped in Michmash.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saa7ooli, a na7aa Yonaataaninne etaara de7iya asai Biniyaaman de7iya Gebaa7an galchchidosona; Pilisxxeema asatikka Mikimaasan galchchidosona.

English Sentences: And the spoilers came out of the camp of the Philistines in three companies: one company turned unto the way that leadeth to Ophrah, unto the land of Shual:
Wolaitta Sentences: Pilisxxeemati galchchidosaappe woraajjiyaageeti heezzu cuge gididi kiyidosona; etappe issi cugee SHu7aala biittan de7iya Oofirakko simmidi biis; naa77anttoi Beeti-Horooni biis;

English Sentences: And another company turned the way to Bethhoron: and another company turned to the way of the border that looketh to the valley of Zeboim toward the wilderness.
Wolaitta Sentences: heezzantto cugee bazzuwaa sinttayida, Xabo7iima Wombbaa duge xeelliya zawaa ogiyaa oiqqidi biis.

English Sentences: Now there was no smith found throughout all the land of Israel: for the Philistines said, Lest the Hebrews make them swords or spears:
Wolaitta Sentences: Pilisxxeema asati, "Ibraaweti bisuwaanne tooraa qoxxoppona" giido gishshau, Israa7eela biitta ubban birata qoxxiyaabi beettibeenna.

English Sentences: But all the Israelites went down to the Philistines, to sharpen every man his share, and his coulter, and his axe, and his mattock.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Israa7eela ubbai bantta marashaa xeeraa, xikkiyaa, kalttaanne baacaa poshissanau Pilisxxeema asatukko boosona.

English Sentences: Yet they had a file for the mattocks, and for the coulters, and for the forks, and for the axes, and to sharpen the goads.
Wolaitta Sentences: Marashaa xeeraanne shalkkiyaa poshissanau hosppun giraame deexxiya biraa qanxxoosona; kalttaa, xikkiyaanne philxxuwaa poshissanau hegau baggaa qanxxoosona.

English Sentences: So it came to pass in the day of battle, that there was neither sword nor spear found in the hand of any of the people that were with Saul and Jonathan: but with Saul and with Jonathan his son was there found.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Saa7oolaaranne Yonaataanaara de7iya asaa ubbaa kushiyan olaa gallassi toorinne bisoi baawa; shin Saa7oolaunne a na7aa Yonaataanau de7ees.

English Sentences: And the garrison of the Philistines went out to the passage of Michmash.
Wolaitta Sentences: Pilisxxeematu cugee Mikimaasa pinuwaa baanau kiyiis.

English Sentences: Now it came to pass upon a day, that Jonathan the son of Saul said unto the young man that bare his armour, Come, and let us go over to the Philistines' garrison, that is on the other side. But he told not his father.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi gallassi Saa7oola na7ai Yonaataani ba ola miishshaa tookkiya wodallaa hagaadan yaagiis; "Haaya; hefintta baggan de7iya Pilisxxeemati galchchidosaa ane boos" yaagiis. SHin ba aawaayyo ha yohuwaa yootibeenna.

English Sentences: And Saul tarried in the uttermost part of Gibeah under a pomegranate tree which is in Migron: and the people that were with him were about six hundred men;
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode Saa7ooli Gib77a matan Migiroonan, roomaane giyo mittaa garssan de7ees. Aara usuppun xeetu asatinne

English Sentences: And Ahiah, the son of Ahitub, Ichabod's brother, the son of Phinehas, the son of Eli, the LORD's priest in Shiloh, wearing an ephod. And the people knew not that Jonathan was gone.
Wolaitta Sentences: eefuudiyaa maayida qeesee, Akiiyi de7oosona. Akiiyi Ikaabooda ishaanne Ahixuuba na7aa; Ahixuubi Seelon GODAA qeese gidida Eela na7ai Piinihaasi yelidoogaa. Yonaataani biichchidoogaa asai eribeenna.

English Sentences: And between the passages, by which Jonathan sought to go over unto the Philistines' garrison, there was a sharp rock on the one side, and a sharp rock on the other side: and the name of the one was Bozez, and the name of the other Seneh.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yonaataani Pilisxxeemati galchchidosaa gakkanau pinnanau qoppiyo pinuwaassi naa77u baggaarakka xeerai puixatiyo gita zaallati de7oosona; issuwaa sunttai Bodeexa; naa77anttuwaa sunttai Seena.

English Sentences: The forefront of the one was situate northward over against Michmash, and the other southward over against Gibeah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Zaallatuppe issoi pinuwaassi huuphessa baggaara Mikimaasau baazzatidi de7iyo wode, issoi qassi tohossa baggaara Gebaa7au baazzatidi de7ees.

English Sentences: And Jonathan said to the young man that bare his armour, Come, and let us go over unto the garrison of these uncircumcised: it may be that the LORD will work for us: for there is no restraint to the LORD to save by many or by few.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yonaataani ba ola miishshaa tookkiya wodallaa hagaadan yaagiis; "Haaya; ha qaxxarettibeennaageeti galchchidosaa ane hefintti boos. Ooni erii, GODAI nu gishshaa oottanaakkonne; GODAI daro asan gidin, guutta asan gidin, ashshanaagaa a diggiyaabi aibinne baawa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And his armourbearer said unto him, Do all that is in thine heart: turn thee; behold, I am with thee according to thy heart.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin a ola miishshaa tookkiyaagee, "Neeni qoppidobaa ubbaa ootta; ba; ta kumetta wozanaappe taani nenaara de7ais" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then said Jonathan, Behold, we will pass over unto these men, and we will discover ourselves unto them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yonaataani, "Yaanikko haaya; hefintti asaakko pinnidi, asan be7ettana.

English Sentences: If they say thus unto us, Tarry until we come to you; then we will stand still in our place, and will not go up unto them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti nuna, Nuuni inttekko baanaashin hegan naagite yaagikko, nuuni de7iyoosan takkanaappe attin, etakko bookko.

English Sentences: But if they say thus, Come up unto us; then we will go up: for the LORD hath delivered them into our hand: and this shall be a sign unto us.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin eti, Haa nuukko pude kiyite giikko, nuuni pude kiyana; aissi giikko, hegee GODAI eta nu kushiyan aattidi immidoogau nuuyyo malaata gidana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And both of them discovered themselves unto the garrison of the Philistines: and the Philistines said, Behold, the Hebrews come forth out of the holes where they had hid themselves.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin, naa77aikka Pilisxxeematu qatuwau banttana bessidosona. Bessin Pilisxxeemati, "Be7ite! Ibraaweti bantta qosettido ollaappe zuummidi kiyoosona" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And the men of the garrison answered Jonathan and his armourbearer, and said, Come up to us, and we will shew you a thing. And Jonathan said unto his armourbearer, Come up after me: for the LORD hath delivered them into the hand of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qatuwan de7iya asati Yonaataananne ola miishshaa tookkiyaagaa xeegidi, "Haa nuukko pude kiyite; nuuni inttena bessana" yaagidosona. Hegaa gishshau, Yonaataani ba ola miishshaa tookkiyaagaa, "Tana kaallada ha pudettaa kiya. GODAI eta Israa7eela kushiyan aattidi immirggiis" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Jonathan climbed up upon his hands and upon his feet, and his armourbearer after him: and they fell before Jonathan; and his armourbearer slew after him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yonaataani ba ola miishshaa tookkiyaagaa kaalettidi, tohuwaaninne kushiyan hambburuucidi pudettaa kiyiis. Pilisxxeemati Yonaataana kushiyan kunddidosona; kunddin a ola miishshaa tookkiyaagee kaalli kaallidi eta woriis.

English Sentences: And that first slaughter, which Jonathan and his armourbearer made, was about twenty men, within as it were an half acre of land, which a yoke of oxen might plow.
Wolaitta Sentences: He koiro woraajjiyan Yonaataaninne a ola miishshaa tookkiyaagee bagga booraso gaden laatamu gidiya asaa woridosona.

English Sentences: And there was trembling in the host, in the field, and among all the people: the garrison, and the spoilers, they also trembled, and the earth quaked: so it was a very great trembling.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, gaxa biittan de7iya Pilisxxeema asati dagammidosona; ambbaanotinne qatuwan de7iya olanchchati yashshau kokkoridosona. Biittaikka qaaxxiis; hegeenne, Xoossaappe kiitettida dagamaa.

English Sentences: And the watchmen of Saul in Gibeah of Benjamin looked; and, behold, the multitude melted away, and they went on beating down one another.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saa7ooli Biniyaama biittan, Gib77an wottido wochchiya asati xeellidi, Pilisxxeema olanchchati yaara haara piskki giidi laalettiyaageeta be7idosona.

English Sentences: Then said Saul unto the people that were with him, Number now, and see who is gone from us. And when they had numbered, behold, Jonathan and his armourbearer were not there.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin, Saa7ooli banaara de7iya asata, "Ane olanchchata shiishshite; shiishshidi nu giddoppe ooni biidaakko be7ite" yaagiis. Yaagin eti shiishshidi qoodiyo wode, Yonaataaninne a ola miishshaa tookkiyaagee bainnaagaa be7idosona.

English Sentences: And Saul said unto Ahiah, Bring hither the ark of God. For the ark of God was at that time with the children of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saa7ooli qeesiyaa Akiiya, "GODAA oichchanau ane eefuudiyaa haa ekkada ya" yaagiis. He wode Akiiyi Israa7eela asaa sinttan eefuudiyaa maayees.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, while Saul talked unto the priest, that the noise that was in the host of the Philistines went on and increased: and Saul said unto the priest, Withdraw thine hand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saa7ooli qeesiyaara haasayishin, Pilisxxeematu qatuwan wocamai dari daridi biis. Hegaa gishshau, Saa7ooli qeesiyaa, "Eefuudiyaappe ne kushiyaa kessargga" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Saul and all the people that were with him assembled themselves, and they came to the battle: and, behold, every man's sword was against his fellow, and there was a very great discomfiture.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Saa7oolinne a asai ubbai shiiqidi, olaa biidosona. Biidi Pilisxxeema asati ubbai shabbirettidi, bantta bisuwan issoi issuwaa busakkiiddi de7iyaageeta demmidosona.

English Sentences: Moreover the Hebrews that were with the Philistines before that time, which went up with them into the camp from the country round about, even they also turned to be with the Israelites that were with Saul and Jonathan.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kase Pilisxxeema asatuura de7idi, etaara pude eti galchchidosaa biida Ibraawetikka eta aggidi, Saa7oolaaranne Yonaataanaara de7iya Israa7eela asan gaittidosona.

English Sentences: Likewise all the men of Israel which had hid themselves in mount Ephraim, when they heard that the Philistines fled, even they also followed hard after them in the battle.
Wolaitta Sentences: Efireema gezziyan qosetti uttida hara Israa7eelatikka Pilisxxeemati baqatiiddi de7iyoogaa siyidosona. Siyidi, etikka yedetaa uukkiya asan gaittidosona.

English Sentences: So the LORD saved Israel that day: and the battle passed over unto Bethaven.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI he gallassi Israa7eela asaa ashshiis. Beeti-Aweena katamaappe hefintti gakkanaukka olai olettiis.

English Sentences: And the men of Israel were distressed that day: for Saul had adjured the people, saying, Cursed be the man that eateth any food until evening, that I may be avenged on mine enemies. So none of the people tasted any food.
Wolaitta Sentences: He gallassi Israa7eela asati namisan labbanidosona; aissi giikko, Saa7ooli asaa, "Sa7ai qammennan de7ishiininne taani ta morkketuyyo halo kessennan de7ishin, quma miya urai qanggettidaagaa gido" yaagidi asaa caaquwan qachchiis. Hegaa gishshau, olanchchatuppe quma doonaakko shiishshida asi ooninne baawa.

English Sentences: And all they of the land came to a wood; and there was honey upon the ground.
Wolaitta Sentences: Olanchchati ubbai muleera woraa giddo geliyo wode, sa7an eessai de7ees.

English Sentences: And when the people were come into the wood, behold, the honey dropped; but no man put his hand to his mouth: for the people feared the oath.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti woraa giddon eessai uzuuziyaagaa be7idosona; shin caaquwaa yayyido gishshau, issi asinne ba kushiyaa doonaakko shiishshibeenna.

English Sentences: But Jonathan heard not when his father charged the people with the oath: wherefore he put forth the end of the rod that was in his hand, and dipped it in an honeycomb, and put his hand to his mouth; and his eyes were enlightened.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yonaataani ba aawai asaa caaquwan qachchidoogaa siyibeenna. Hegaa gishshau, ba kushiyan de7iya xam77aa xeeraa ililuwan yeddi kessidi, laacciis; laaccin a aifee dooyettiis.

English Sentences: Then answered one of the people, and said, Thy father straitly charged the people with an oath, saying, Cursed be the man that eateth any food this day. And the people were faint.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, olanchchatuppe issoi a, "Ne aawai olanchchata ubbaa, Hachchi quma miya urai qanggettidaagaa gido yaagidi, caaquwan qachchi wottiis; asai ubbai labbanidoi hegaassa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then said Jonathan, My father hath troubled the land: see, I pray you, how mine eyes have been enlightened, because I tasted a little of this honey.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yonaataani hagaadan yaagiis; "Ta aawai biittaassi meto medhdhiis. Taani ha eessaappe guuttaa laaccin, ta aifee ai keenaa dooyettidaakko be7a.

English Sentences: How much more, if haply the people had eaten freely to day of the spoil of their enemies which they found? for had there not been now a much greater slaughter among the Philistines?
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai ba morkketuppe omooddidobaappe hachchi miidabaa gidiyaakko, aiba lo77oo shin; eti worana Pilisxxeematu qoodaikka ai keenaa daranaagaa shin" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they smote the Philistines that day from Michmash to Aijalon: and the people were very faint.
Wolaitta Sentences: He gallassi Israa7eela asati Mikimaasappe Ayyaaloona gakkanaashin, Pilisxxeemata shoci simmidi daafuridosona.

English Sentences: And the people flew upon the spoil, and took sheep, and oxen, and calves, and slew them on the ground: and the people did eat them with the blood.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti omooduwaa gauhiyidi, dorssata, miizzatanne marata ekkidosona; ekkidi biittan coo shukkidi, suuttaarakka miidosona.

English Sentences: Then they told Saul, saying, Behold, the people sin against the LORD, in that they eat with the blood. And he said, Ye have transgressed: roll a great stone unto me this day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, issi asi Saa7oola, "Be7a; asai suuttaara de7iya ashuwaa miiddi, GODAA bolli nagaraa oottees" yaagiis. Yaagin i eta, "Intte nagaraa oottideta; wogga shuchchaa eesuwan haa taakko gonddorssite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Saul said, Disperse yourselves among the people, and say unto them, Bring me hither every man his ox, and every man his sheep, and slay them here, and eat; and sin not against the LORD in eating with the blood. And all the people brought every man his ox with him that night, and slew them there.
Wolaitta Sentences: Zaarettidikka, "Kiyidi asaa giddo biite; biidi eta hagaadan yaagite; Huuphiyan huuphiyan intte booraanne dorssaa taayyo haa ekki yiite; yaatidi hagan wogaadan shukkidi miite. Suuttaara de7iya ashuwaa miidi, GODAA bolli nagaraa oottoppite yaaga" yaagiis. Hegaa gishshau, he gallassi qammi asati ubbai ba booraa booraa ehiidi, yan shukkidosona.

English Sentences: And Saul built an altar unto the LORD: the same was the first altar that he built unto the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saa7ooli he sohuwan GODAASSI yarshshiyoosaa gimbbiis; GODAASSI yarshshiyoosaa i gimbbishin, hegee ayyo koiro.

English Sentences: And Saul said, Let us go down after the Philistines by night, and spoil them until the morning light, and let us not leave a man of them. And they said, Do whatsoever seemeth good unto thee. Then said the priest, Let us draw near hither unto God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saa7ooli, "Ha qammaara duge Pilisxxeemata kaallidi ane boos; biidi sa7ai wonttana gakkanaashin, etabaa ubbaa bonqqoos; etakka issuwaanne ashshennan woroos" yaagiis. Yaagin eti, "Eeno, nena lo77idabaa ubbaa ootta" yaagidi zaaridosona. SHin qeesee, "Ane hagan Xoossaa oichchoos" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Saul asked counsel of God, Shall I go down after the Philistines? wilt thou deliver them into the hand of Israel? But he answered him not that day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Saa7ooli Xoossaa, "Pilisxxeema asata kaallada boo? Bin neeni eta Israa7eelatu kushiyan aattada immuutee?" yaagidi oichchiis. SHin he gallassi Xoossai ayyo odibeenna.

English Sentences: And Saul said, Draw ye near hither, all the chief of the people: and know and see wherein this sin hath been this day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaanin Saa7ooli, "Olanchchata halaqatoo, ubbai haayite; hachchi aiba nagari oosettidaakkonne ane qoridi demmoos.

English Sentences: For, as the LORD liveth, which saveth Israel, though it be in Jonathan my son, he shall surely die. But there was not a man among all the people that answered him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela ashshiya GODAI ero! Ta na7aa Yonaataana gidikkokka, haiqqanau bessees" yaagiis. SHin asaappe issi urainne qaala qaattibeenna.

English Sentences: Then said he unto all Israel, Be ye on one side, and I and Jonathan my son will be on the other side. And the people said unto Saul, Do what seemeth good unto thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Saa7ooli Israa7eela asaa ubbaa, "Intte ubbaikka ya baggan eqqite; taaninne ta na7aa Yonaataani ha baggan eqqana" yaagiis. Yaagin asati, "Eeno, nena lo77abaa ootta" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Therefore Saul said unto the LORD God of Israel, Give a perfect lot. And Saul and Jonathan were taken: but the people escaped.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Saa7ooli GODAA Israa7eela Xoossaa, "Taayyo likke zaaruwaa imma" yaagidi woossiis. Woossin saamai Saa7oola bollinne Yonaataana bolli wodhdhin asai geeyiis.

English Sentences: And Saul said, Cast lots between me and Jonathan my son. And Jonathan was taken.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Saa7ooli, "Ta bollinne ta na7aa Yonaataana bolli yeggite" yaagiis. Yaagin saamai Yonaataana bolli wodhdhiis.

English Sentences: Then Saul said to Jonathan, Tell me what thou hast done. And Jonathan told him, and said, I did but taste a little honey with the end of the rod that was in mine hand, and, lo, I must die.
Wolaitta Sentences: Wodhdhin Saa7ooli Yonaataana, "Ane neeni oottidobaa oda" yaagiis. Yaagin Yonaataani, "Taani guutta eessa ililo ta xam77aa xeeraappe laaccaas. Hekko taani hagan de7ais; taani haiqqana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Saul answered, God do so and more also: for thou shalt surely die, Jonathan.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saa7ooli hagaadan yaagiis; "Yonaatanaa, neeni haiqqana xayikko, Xoossai tana woro!" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the people said unto Saul, Shall Jonathan die, who hath wrought this great salvation in Israel? God forbid: as the LORD liveth, there shall not one hair of his head fall to the ground; for he hath wrought with God this day. So the people rescued Jonathan, that he died not.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin asai Saa7oola, "Yonaataani, Israa7eelassi ha gita xoonuwaa ehiidaagee haiqqanee? Hegee mulekka hanenna! De7o Xoossai ero! A huuphiyaappe issi binnaaninne biittan wodhdhenna; aissi giikko, i hachchi hagaa Xoossaa maaduwan oottiis" yaagidosona. Yaatidi asai Yonaataana ashshin, i haiqqennan attiis.

English Sentences: Then Saul went up from following the Philistines: and the Philistines went to their own place.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Saa7ooli Pilisxxeema asata yedettiyoogaa aggiis; aggin eti bantta biitti simmidosona.

English Sentences: So Saul took the kingdom over Israel, and fought against all his enemies on every side, against Moab, and against the children of Ammon, and against Edom, and against the kings of Zobah, and against the Philistines: and whithersoever he turned himself, he vexed them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saa7ooli Israa7eela bolli kawotidoogaappe guyyiyan, ubba sohuwaara de7iya ba morkketa oliis; hegeetikka: Moo7aabata, Amoonata, Eedoomata, Xooba kawotanne Pilisxxeema asata. Ba biidosan ubban xooniis.

English Sentences: And he gathered an host, and smote the Amalekites, and delivered Israel out of the hands of them that spoiled them.
Wolaitta Sentences: I minnidi olettiis; Amaaleeqa asata xooniis; Israa7eela asaa bonqqiyaageetu kushiyaappe ashshiis.

English Sentences: Now the sons of Saul were Jonathan, and Ishui, and Melchishua: and the names of his two daughters were these; the name of the firstborn Merab, and the name of the younger Michal:
Wolaitta Sentences: Saa7oola attuma naati Yonaataana, Yishiwanne Malkkishuu7a; ayyo baira na7ee sunttai Meraabo; kaalo na7ee sunttai Miikaalo.

English Sentences: And the name of Saul's wife was Ahinoam, the daughter of Ahimaaz: and the name of the captain of his host was Abner, the son of Ner, Saul's uncle.
Wolaitta Sentences: A keettaayyiyaa Ahima7aaxa na7iyo Ahino7aamo. A olanchchatu gadaawai a aawaa ishaa Neera na7aa Abaneera.

English Sentences: And Kish was the father of Saul; and Ner the father of Abner was the son of Abiel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saa7oola aawaa Qiisinne Abaneera aawaa Neeri Abii7eela naata.

English Sentences: And there was sore war against the Philistines all the days of Saul: and when Saul saw any strong man, or any valiant man, he took him unto him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saa7ooli de7ido laitta ubban Pilisxxeema asatuura suulo olaa olettiiddi de7iis. Mino asa woikko xala asa demmido wode ubban, i he uraa ba olanchchatun gujjees.

English Sentences: Samuel also said unto Saul, The LORD sent me to anoint thee to be king over his people, over Israel: now therefore hearken thou unto the voice of the words of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sameeli Saa7oola, "Ba asaa Israa7eela bolli neeni kawotanaadan tiyanau GODAI kiittidoogee tana; GODAA qaalaa siya.

English Sentences: Thus saith the LORD of hosts, I remember that which Amalek did to Israel, how he laid wait for him in the way, when he came up from Egypt.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAI hagaadan yaagees; Israa7eelati Gibxxeppe kiyidi yiyo wode Amaaleeqa asati ogiyan etaara eqettido gishshau, taani Amaaleeqa asata qaxxayana.

English Sentences: Now go and smite Amalek, and utterly destroy all that they have, and spare them not; but slay both man and woman, infant and suckling, ox and sheep, camel and ass.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha77i ba; baada Amaaleeqa asata shoca; etayyo de7iyaabaa ubbaa muleera xaissa; eta ashshoppa; eta maccaa attumaa, xammiyaagaa qucciyaagaa, miizzaa dorssaa, gaameelaanne hariyaa wora yaagees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Saul gathered the people together, and numbered them in Telaim, two hundred thousand footmen, and ten thousand men of Judah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Saa7ooli asaa xeegidi, Xeleema giyoosan qoodiis; qoodiyo wode tohuwaasai naa77u xeetu sha7a; Yihudaappe tammu sha7u asai de7ees.

English Sentences: And Saul came to a city of Amalek, and laid wait in the valley.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saa7ooli Amaaleeqatu katamaa biidi, issi zanggaaraa giddon geemetti uttiis.

English Sentences: And Saul said unto the Kenites, Go, depart, get you down from among the Amalekites, lest I destroy you with them: for ye shewed kindness to all the children of Israel, when they came up out of Egypt. So the Kenites departed from among the Amalekites.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saa7ooli Qeena asata, "Taani inttena Amaaleeqa asatuura issippe bashshenna mala, denddite! Denddidi eta giddoppe kiyite! Hagaappe kichchite! Aissi giikko, Israa7eelati Gibxxeppe kiyiyo wode, intte eta ubbaayyo kehideta" yaagiis. Yaagin Qeena asati Amaaleeqa asatu giddoppe kiyidi biidosona.

English Sentences: And Saul smote the Amalekites from Havilah until thou comest to Shur, that is over against Egypt.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saa7ooli Amaaleeqa asata Hawiilappe doommidi, Gibxxe sinttan de7iya SHura gakkanaashin shociis.

English Sentences: And he took Agag the king of the Amalekites alive, and utterly destroyed all the people with the edge of the sword.
Wolaitta Sentences: Amaaleeqatu Kawuwaa Agaaga paxa de7ishin, Saa7ooli omooddiis; a asaa ubbaa qara bisuwan wori wurssiis.

English Sentences: But Saul and the people spared Agag, and the best of the sheep, and of the oxen, and of the fatlings, and the lambs, and all that was good, and would not utterly destroy them: but every thing that was vile and refuse, that they destroyed utterly.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Saa7oolinne a olanchchati, Agaaganne ubbaappe lo77iya dorssata, miizzata, anqqara marata, galotanne hara lo77obata ubbaa ashshidosona; eti hageeta muleera wori wurssanau dosibookkona; shin eti laafabaanne karettidabaa muleera xaissidosona.

English Sentences: Then came the word of the LORD unto Samuel, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA qaalai Sameelakko hagaadan yaagiiddi yiis;

English Sentences: It repenteth me that I have set up Saul to be king: for he is turned back from following me, and hath not performed my commandments. And it grieved Samuel; and he cried unto the LORD all night.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani Saa7oola kawo kessidoogau azzanais; aissi giikko, Saa7ooli tana kaalliyoogaa aggiis; ta azazuwaa oottibeenna" yaagiis. Yaagin Sameeli metootiis; metootidi he qamma kumettaa GODAAKKO waassiis.

English Sentences: And when Samuel rose early to meet Saul in the morning, it was told Samuel, saying, Saul came to Carmel, and, behold, he set him up a place, and is gone about, and passed on, and gone down to Gilgal.
Wolaitta Sentences: Maallado guuran Sameeli denddidi, Saa7oolaara gaittanau biis; shin asai ayyo, "Saa7ooli Qarmmeloosa katamaa biis; biidi yan bana hassayissiya hawulttiyaa essiis; hegaappe simmidi, Gelggala wodhdhiis" yaagidi yootiis.

English Sentences: And Samuel came to Saul: and Saul said unto him, Blessed be thou of the LORD: I have performed the commandment of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yootin Sameeli Saa7oolakko gakkiis; gakkin Saa7ooli Sameela, "GODAI nena anjjo; taani GODAA azazuwaa oottaas" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Samuel said, What meaneth then this bleating of the sheep in mine ears, and the lowing of the oxen which I hear?
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Sameeli Saa7oola, "Ha taani siyiyo dorssaa waasoinne miizzaa waasoi aibee?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Saul said, They have brought them from the Amalekites: for the people spared the best of the sheep and of the oxen, to sacrifice unto the LORD thy God; and the rest we have utterly destroyed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Saa7ooli, "Olanchchati hageeta Amaaleeqatuppe ehiidosona; eti GODAAYYO, ne Xoossaayyo yarshshanau, ubbaappe lo77iya dorssatanne miizzata ashshidosona; shin haraata muliyaakka xaissida" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then Samuel said unto Saul, Stay, and I will tell thee what the LORD hath said to me this night. And he said unto him, Say on.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sameeli Saa7oola, "Ane nangga; GODAI zino qammi taayyo yootidobaa taani neeyyo odais" yaagiis. Yaagin Saa7ooli, "Oda" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Samuel said, When thou wast little in thine own sight, wast thou not made the head of the tribes of Israel, and the LORD anointed thee king over Israel?
Wolaitta Sentences: Sameeli Saa7oola yaagiis; "Neeni nena xeellin guutta gidikkokka, Israa7eela zaretuyyo kawo gidabeikkii? Israa7eela bolli kawotana mala, GODAI nena tiyiis.

English Sentences: And the LORD sent thee on a journey, and said, Go and utterly destroy the sinners the Amalekites, and fight against them until they be consumed.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI nena, Baada Amaaleeqa asata iitata muleera xaissa; eti wurana gakkanaashin eta ola yaagidi kiittiis.

English Sentences: Wherefore then didst thou not obey the voice of the LORD, but didst fly upon the spoil, and didst evil in the sight of the LORD?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin, aissi GODAAYYO azazettabeikkii? Aissi omooduwau yaaretada GODAA sinttan iitabaa oottadii?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Saul said unto Samuel, Yea, I have obeyed the voice of the LORD, and have gone the way which the LORD sent me, and have brought Agag the king of Amalek, and have utterly destroyed the Amalekites.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Saa7ooli, "Taani GODAA qaalau azazettaasittennee! I tana kiittidoogaadan baas; baada Amaaleeqa asata wora wurssaas; eta Kawuwaa Agaaga ehaas.

English Sentences: But the people took of the spoil, sheep and oxen, the chief of the things which should have been utterly destroyed, to sacrifice unto the LORD thy God in Gilgal.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin olanchchati omooduwaappe dorssaanne miizzaa ubbaappe lo77iyaageeta, GODAAYYO, ne Xoossaayyo, Gelggalan yarshshanau ekki yiidosona" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Samuel said, Hath the LORD as great delight in burnt offerings and sacrifices, as in obeying the voice of the LORD? Behold, to obey is better than sacrifice, and to hearken than the fat of rams.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sameeli Saa7oola, "GODAI ba qaalau azazettiyoogan ufaittiyoogaa keenaa xuuggiyo yarshshuwaaninne imotan ufaittii? Be7a; azazettiyoogee yarshshiyoogaappe aadhdhees; qassi ezggiyoogee dorssaa modhdhuwaappe aadhdhees.

English Sentences: For rebellion is as the sin of witchcraft, and stubbornness is as iniquity and idolatry. Because thou hast rejected the word of the LORD, he hath also rejected thee from being king.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, xibiyoogee shareechchiyo nagaraa mala; qassi otorettiyoogee eeqau goinniyo iitatettaa mala. Neeni GODAA qaalaa ixxido gishshau, GODAI neeni kawo gidiyoogaa ixxiis" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Saul said unto Samuel, I have sinned: for I have transgressed the commandment of the LORD, and thy words: because I feared the people, and obeyed their voice.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saa7ooli Sameela, "Taani nagaraa oottaas; GODAA azazuwaanne ne qaalaa toochchaas. Taani asaayyo yayyido gishshau, eti giidobaa oottaas.

English Sentences: Now therefore, I pray thee, pardon my sin, and turn again with me, that I may worship the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hai ta nagaraa atto garkkii; taani GODAAYYO goinnana mala, tanaara Gelggala hinddarkkii" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Samuel said unto Saul, I will not return with thee: for thou hast rejected the word of the LORD, and the LORD hath rejected thee from being king over Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Sameeli Saa7oola, "Taani nenaara simmada biikke! Neeni GODAA qaalaa ixxido gishshau, neeni Israa7eela bolli kawo gidiyoogaa GODAI ixxiis" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And as Samuel turned about to go away, he laid hold upon the skirt of his mantle, and it rent.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sameeli Saa7oola matappe baanau denddin, Saa7ooli a maayuwaa macaraa oiqqiis; oiqqin maayoi pooshettiis.

English Sentences: And Samuel said unto him, The LORD hath rent the kingdom of Israel from thee this day, and hath given it to a neighbour of thine, that is better than thou.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sameeli Saa7oola, "GODAI hachchi Israa7eela kawotettaa neeppe pooshshiis; pooshshidi neeppe lo77iya ne shooruwaayyo immiis.

English Sentences: And also the Strength of Israel will not lie nor repent: for he is not a man, that he should repent.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela Bonchchoi worddotenna, woikko ba qofaa laammenna; aissi giikko, ba qaalaa laammanau i asa gidenna" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then he said, I have sinned: yet honour me now, I pray thee, before the elders of my people, and before Israel, and turn again with me, that I may worship the LORD thy God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Saa7ooli Sameela, "Taani nagaraa oottaas; shin ta biittaa cimatu sinttaaninne Israa7eela asaa sinttan hai tana kaushshopparkkii; taani GODAAYYO, ne Xoossaayyo goinnanaadan, neeni tanaara hinddarkkii" yaagidi zaariis.

English Sentences: So Samuel turned again after Saul; and Saul worshipped the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Sameeli Saa7oolaara issippe Gelggala biis; bin Saa7ooli GODAAYYO goinniis.

English Sentences: Then said Samuel, Bring ye hither to me Agag the king of the Amalekites. And Agag came unto him delicately. And Agag said, Surely the bitterness of death is past.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan Sameeli, "Amaaleeqatu Kawuwaa Agaaga taakko ehiite" yaagidi azaziis. Agaagi kokkoriiddi Sameelakko yiis; yiidi, "Tumu haiqoi hagaadan cammii!" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Samuel said, As thy sword hath made women childless, so shall thy mother be childless among women. And Samuel hewed Agag in pieces before the LORD in Gilgal.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Sameeli Agaaga, "Ne bisoi maccaasata xontta ashshidoogaadan, ne aayyiyaakka maccaasatu giddon xontta attana" yaagiis. Sameeli Agaaga GODAA sinttan Gelggalan siifiis.

English Sentences: Then Samuel went to Ramah; and Saul went up to his house to Gibeah of Saul.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Sameeli denddidi, Raama katamaa biis; Saa7oolikka ba soo Gib77aa biis.

English Sentences: And Samuel came no more to see Saul until the day of his death: nevertheless Samuel mourned for Saul: and the LORD repented that he had made Saul king over Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sameeli haiqqana gakkanaashin, Saa7oola naa77antto bibeenna; gidikkonne, Sameeli Saa7oola gishshau yeekkiis. Saa7oola Israa7eela bolli kawoyidoogau GODAI azzaniis.

English Sentences: And the LORD said unto Samuel, How long wilt thou mourn for Saul, seeing I have rejected him from reigning over Israel? fill thine horn with oil, and go, I will send thee to Jesse the Bethlehemite: for I have provided me a king among his sons.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Sameela, "Israa7eela bolli i kawo gidenna mala, taani ixxaichchido Saa7oola gishshau, neeni aude gakkanaashin yeekkuutee? Ane kaciyan zaitiyaa kunttada kiya; taani nena Beetaliheemiyaa Isseyakko kiittais; kawo gidana mala, taani a naatu giddoppe issuwaa doora wottaas" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Samuel said, How can I go? if Saul hear it, he will kill me. And the LORD said, Take an heifer with thee, and say, I am come to sacrifice to the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Sameeli, "Taani waanada boo? Saa7ooli siyidi tana worana" yaagiis. GODAI Sameela, "Ussa issinniyo ekkada ba; baada, Taani GODAAYYO yarshshanau yaas yaaga.

English Sentences: And call Jesse to the sacrifice, and I will shew thee what thou shalt do: and thou shalt anoint unto me him whom I name unto thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Isseyakka yarshshuwaasaa xeesa. Neeni oottanabaa taani nena bessana; taani neeyyo yootiyoogaa taassi tiya" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Samuel did that which the LORD spake, and came to Bethlehem. And the elders of the town trembled at his coming, and said, Comest thou peaceably?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Sameeli GODAI yootidoogaa oottiis; Beetaliheeme biis. Beetaliheeme katamaa cimati kokkoriiddi aara gaittidosona. Eti a, "Neeni sarotettau yaadii?" yaagidi oichchidosona.

English Sentences: And he said, Peaceably: I am come to sacrifice unto the LORD: sanctify yourselves, and come with me to the sacrifice. And he sanctified Jesse and his sons, and called them to the sacrifice.
Wolaitta Sentences: Oichchin Sameeli, "Ee; sarotettau yaas; taani GODAAYYO yarshshanau yaas; inttekka geeyite; yaatidi tanaara yarshshuwaasaa hinddite" yaagiis; qassi Isseyanne a naata geeshshidi, yarshshuwaasaa eta xeesiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, when they were come, that he looked on Eliab, and said, Surely the LORD's anointed is before him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti yarshshuwaasaa gakkiyo wode, Sameeli Isseya na7aa Eli7aaba be7idi, "Tumuppe GODAI tiyoogee hagan a sinttan eqqiis" yaagidi qoppiis.

English Sentences: But the LORD said unto Samuel, Look not on his countenance, or on the height of his stature; because I have refused him: for the LORD seeth not as man seeth; for man looketh on the outward appearance, but the LORD looketh on the heart.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin GODAI Sameela, "A meraa woikko a geesaa adussatettaa xeelloppa; taani a ixxaas. Aissi giikko, taani GODAI asi xeelliyoogaadan xeellikke; asi som77uwaa xeellees; shin GODAI wozanaa xeellees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then Jesse called Abinadab, and made him pass before Samuel. And he said, Neither hath the LORD chosen this.
Wolaitta Sentences: Isseyi Abinadaaba xeesidi, Sameela sintti aattiis; aattin Sameeli, "CHii; GODAI hagaakka dooribeenna" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then Jesse made Shammah to pass by. And he said, Neither hath the LORD chosen this.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin, Isseyi SHaama aattiis; aattin Sameeli, "CHii; GODAI hagaakka dooribeenna" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Again, Jesse made seven of his sons to pass before Samuel. And Samuel said unto Jesse, The LORD hath not chosen these.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaadan oottidi, Isseyi ba naata laappunaa Sameela sintti aattiis; shin Sameeli Isseya, "GODAI hageeta dooribeenna" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Samuel said unto Jesse, Are here all thy children? And he said, There remaineth yet the youngest, and, behold, he keepeth the sheep. And Samuel said unto Jesse, Send and fetch him: for we will not sit down till he come hither.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, i Isseya, "Neeyyo de7iya naati hageetu xalaaleeyye?" yaagidi oichchiis. Oichchin Isseyi, "Ubbaappe kaalo na7ai attiis; shin i dorssata heemmees" yaagiis. Yaagin Sameeli, "Kiittada a ehiissa; i yaana gakkanaashin nuuni yarshshokko" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he sent, and brought him in. Now he was ruddy, and withal of a beautiful countenance, and goodly to look to. And the LORD said, Arise, anoint him: for this is he.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Isseyi kiittidi, na7aa ehiissiis; he na7ai arssa; aifiyaara lo77iya puulanchcha. GODAI Sameela, "Dendda eqqada tiya; hagee a" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then Samuel took the horn of oil, and anointed him in the midst of his brethren: and the Spirit of the LORD came upon David from that day forward. So Samuel rose up, and went to Ramah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Sameeli kaciyaa zaitiyaa ekkidi, a ishatu sinttan Daawita tiyiis. He gallassappe doommidi, GODAA Ayyaanai Daawita bollan wolqqappe wodhdhiis. Hegaappe guyyiyan, Sameeli denddidi, Raama katamaa biis.

English Sentences: But the Spirit of the LORD departed from Saul, and an evil spirit from the LORD troubled him.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA Ayyaanai Saa7oolappe shaahettiis; shaahettin GODAAPPE kiitettida iita ayyaanai Saa7oola niqiichchiis.

English Sentences: And Saul's servants said unto him, Behold now, an evil spirit from God troubleth thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saa7oola ashkkarati a, "Xoossaappe kiitettida iita ayyaanai nena niqiichchees.

English Sentences: Let our lord now command thy servants, which are before thee, to seek out a man, who is a cunning player on an harp: and it shall come to pass, when the evil spirit from God is upon thee, that he shall play with his hand, and thou shalt be well.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nu godai diittaa loitti diixxiya asa koyana mala, ba ashkkarata, hagan de7iyaageeta azazo. Xoossaappe kiitettida iita ayyaanai nena oiqqiyo wode, he bitanee diittaa diixxana; i diixxin neeyyo kehana" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And Saul said unto his servants, Provide me now a man that can play well, and bring him to me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Saa7ooli ba ashkkarata, "Diittaa loittidi diixxiya asa koyidi, taayyo ekki yiite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then answered one of the servants, and said, Behold, I have seen a son of Jesse the Bethlehemite, that is cunning in playing, and a mighty valiant man, and a man of war, and prudent in matters, and a comely person, and the LORD is with him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ashkkaratuppe issoi Saa7oola, "Be7a; Beetaliheemiyaa Isseyayyo diittaa loittidi diixxiya issi na7ai de7ees. He na7ai xalanne tooranchcha asa; haasayassi cinccanne puulanchcha asa; qassi GODAI aara issippe de7ees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Wherefore Saul sent messengers unto Jesse, and said, Send me David thy son, which is with the sheep.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin, Saa7ooli Isseyakko kiittidi, "Ne dorssaa heemmiya ne na7aa Daawita taayyo yedda" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Jesse took an ass laden with bread, and a bottle of wine, and a kid, and sent them by David his son unto Saul.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Isseyi oittaa, ogoro woine eessaanne galo dorssa mara issuwaa hariyan caanidi, ba na7aa Daawitaara Saa7oolayyo yeddiis.

English Sentences: And David came to Saul, and stood before him: and he loved him greatly; and he became his armourbearer.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti Saa7oolakko yiis; yiidi a oosuwan geliis. Saa7ooli Daawita keehippe dosiis; Daawiti Saa7oolayyo ola miishshaa oiqqiyaagaa gidiis.

English Sentences: And Saul sent to Jesse, saying, Let David, I pray thee, stand before me; for he hath found favour in my sight.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin, Saa7ooli Isseyayyo, "Daawiti taayyo oottiiddi takkishsho; taani a dosaas" yaagidi kiittiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, when the evil spirit from God was upon Saul, that David took an harp, and played with his hand: so Saul was refreshed, and was well, and the evil spirit departed from him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe simmin, Xoossaappe kiitettida iita ayyaanai Saa7oola oiqqiyo wode ubban, Daawiti diittaa ekkidi ba kushiyan diixxees; diixxin iita ayyaanai a yeddiyo gishshau, Saa7oolayyo keheesinne i paxees.

English Sentences: Now the Philistines gathered together their armies to battle, and were gathered together at Shochoh, which belongeth to Judah, and pitched between Shochoh and Azekah, in Ephesdammim.
Wolaitta Sentences: Pilisxxeema asati bantta olanchchata Yihudan de7iya Sooko giyo sohuwaa olau shiishshidosona; Sookoppenne Azeeqappe gidduwan de7iya Efesxxamiima giyo issi sohuwan shiiqi uttidosona.

English Sentences: And Saul and the men of Israel were gathered together, and pitched by the valley of Elah, and set the battle in array against the Philistines.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saa7oolinne Israa7eelati Eela giyo zanggaaran shiiqi uttidosona; uttidi Pilisxxeema asatuura olettanau salppiyan kiyidosona.

English Sentences: And the Philistines stood on a mountain on the one side, and Israel stood on a mountain on the other side: and there was a valley between them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Pilisxxeema olanchchati issi keran salppin, Israa7eelatikka hara keran salppidosona; eta naa77aa zanggaarai shaakkees.

English Sentences: And there went out a champion out of the camp of the Philistines, named Goliath, of Gath, whose height was six cubits and a span.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gaate kataman de7iya, Gooliyaada giyo issi tooraa qara bitanee Pilisxxeemati galchchidosaappe yiis; a geesai usuppun waranne takkaaro.

English Sentences: And he had an helmet of brass upon his head, and he was armed with a coat of mail; and the weight of the coat was five thousand shekels of brass.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ishatamanne laappun kilo giraame deexxiya nahaase birata kootiyaa maayiis; qassi nahaase birata qophiyaa ba huuphiyan wottiis.

English Sentences: And he had greaves of brass upon his legs, and a target of brass between his shoulders.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nahaase birataa gambbaaliyaa ba tohuwan aattiis; ba hashiyan nahaase birataappe qoxettida xinqqaa tookkiis.

English Sentences: And the staff of his spear was like a weaver's beam; and his spear's head weighed six hundred shekels of iron: and one bearing a shield went before him.
Wolaitta Sentences: A bodaa toomai shimainniyaa wonddarashiyaa keena; bodaa aifee laappun kilo giraame deexxees; gonddalliyaa tookkida issi bitanee a sinttan hemettees.

English Sentences: And he stood and cried unto the armies of Israel, and said unto them, Why are ye come out to set your battle in array? am not I a Philistine, and ye servants to Saul? choose you a man for you, and let him come down to me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gooliyaadi eqqidi, qaalaa xoqqu oottidi, Israa7eela olanchchatuyyo hagaadan yaagidi gairiis; "Intte waanana giidi olau salppidetii? Taani Pilisxxeema asa gidikkinaa? Qassi intte Saa7oola ashkkarata gidekketii? Ane intte giddoppe issi asa doorite; he bitanee taakko wodhdho.

English Sentences: If he be able to fight with me, and to kill me, then will we be your servants: but if I prevail against him, and kill him, then shall ye be our servants, and serve us.
Wolaitta Sentences: He bitanee tanaara olettidi tana worikko, nuuni intte ashkkarata gidana; shin taani a xoonada worikko intte nu ashkkarata gidananne nuussi haarettana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the Philistine said, I defy the armies of Israel this day; give me a man, that we may fight together.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka he Pilisxxeeme bitanee, "Taani hachchi Israa7eela olanchchata naassais; taayyo issi asa immite; ane naa77ai olettoos!" yaagiis.

English Sentences: When Saul and all Israel heard those words of the Philistine, they were dismayed, and greatly afraid.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saa7oolinne Israa7eelati Pilisxxeemiyaa qaalaa siyidi, yeellatidosonanne daroppe yayyidosona.

English Sentences: Now David was the son of that Ephrathite of Bethlehemjudah, whose name was Jesse; and he had eight sons: and the man went among men for an old man in the days of Saul.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti Yihudaa biittan Beetaliheemen de7iya Efiraataa Isseya na7aa. Isseyayyo hosppun attuma naati de7oosona; Saa7ooli kawo gididi de7iyo wode, Isseyi keehippe cimidanne daro de7ida asa.

English Sentences: And the three eldest sons of Jesse went and followed Saul to the battle: and the names of his three sons that went to the battle were Eliab the firstborn, and next unto him Abinadab, and the third Shammah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Isseya attuma naati bairatiyaageeti heezzati Saa7oola kaallidi olaa biidosona; olaa biida a heezzu naatu sunttai hagaa; bairai Eli7aaba; kaaloi Aminadaaba; heezzanttoi SHaama.

English Sentences: And David was the youngest: and the three eldest followed Saul.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti naatu ubbaappe kaalo. Baira heezzu naati Saa7oola kaallidosona;

English Sentences: But David went and returned from Saul to feed his father's sheep at Bethlehem.
Wolaitta Sentences: shin Daawiti ba aawaa dorssata heemmanau Saa7oola mataappe Beetaliheeme simerettees.

English Sentences: And the Philistine drew near morning and evening, and presented himself forty days.
Wolaitta Sentences: He Pilisxxeemee oitamu gallassau maalladonne omarssi yiidi, Israa7eelata naassees.

English Sentences: And Jesse said unto David his son, Take now for thy brethren an ephah of this parched corn, and these ten loaves, and run to the camp to thy brethren.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi gallassi Isseyi ba na7aa Daawitayyo hagaadan yaagiis; "Ha xiixettida tiyaappe tammu kilo giraamiyaanne ha tammu oittata ekkada, ne ishanttuyyo efa; efaada ne ishantti galchchidosaa eesuwan gatta.

English Sentences: And carry these ten cheeses unto the captain of their thousand, and look how thy brethren fare, and take their pledge.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha tammu nuha pilatakka eta shaalaqaayyo efa; ne ishantti waani de7iyaakko be7ada, eti saro de7iyoogau malaataa etappe ekkada ya.

English Sentences: Now Saul, and they, and all the men of Israel, were in the valley of Elah, fighting with the Philistines.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi Saa7ooli, ne ishanttinne Israa7eela asai ubbai, Pilisxxeema asatuura olettiiddi, Eela Zanggaaran de7oosona" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And David rose up early in the morning, and left the sheep with a keeper, and took, and went, as Jesse had commanded him; and he came to the trench, as the host was going forth to the fight, and shouted for the battle.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Daawiti maallado guuraara denddiis; denddidi dorssaa wudiyaa hara asa henttidi, Isseyi azazidobaa caani ekkidi biis. Israa7eela olanchchati bantta qaalaa xoqqu oottidi garmmaamiiddi olau salppishin, Daawiti gakkiis.

English Sentences: For Israel and the Philistines had put the battle in array, army against army.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela asatinne Pilisxxeema asati issoi issuwaakko xeellidi salppidosona.

English Sentences: And David left his carriage in the hand of the keeper of the carriage, and ran into the army, and came and saluted his brethren.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti ba ehiido miishshaa shinqqiyaa naagiyaagaa kushiyan wottidi, olaa salppiyaa woxxi biidi, ba ishantta sarotiis.

English Sentences: And as he talked with them, behold, there came up the champion, the Philistine of Gath, Goliath by name, out of the armies of the Philistines, and spake according to the same words: and David heard them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti ba ishanttuura haasayishin, Gaateppe yiida tooraa qarai, Pilisxxeemiyaa Gooliyaadi ba salppiyaappe gaxi kiyidi, haroodeegaadankka Israa7eelata naassiis; i naassiyoogaa Daawiti siyiis.

English Sentences: And all the men of Israel, when they saw the man, fled from him, and were sore afraid.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela asai ubbai he bitaniyaa be7ido wode, keehippe yayyidi appe baqatidosona.

English Sentences: And the men of Israel said, Have ye seen this man that is come up? surely to defy Israel is he come up: and it shall be, that the man who killeth him, the king will enrich him with great riches, and will give him his daughter, and make his father's house free in Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela asai issoi issuwaa, "Ha kiyiya bitaniyaa be7idetii? I tumaappe Israa7eela naassanau kiyiis! Ha bitaniyaa woriya urau Kawoi Saa7ooli daro aquwaa immana; qassi ba na7iyookka ayyo immana; a aawaa keettaa asai Israa7eelan kawo giiraakka giirenna" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And David spake to the men that stood by him, saying, What shall be done to the man that killeth this Philistine, and taketh away the reproach from Israel? for who is this uncircumcised Philistine, that he should defy the armies of the living God?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Daawiti ba matan eqqida asaa, "Ha Pilisxxeemiyaa woridi, ha yeellaa Israa7eelappe qucciya uraassi aibi oosettanee? Ha qaxxarettibeenna Pilisxxeemee, de7o Xoossaa olanchchata naassiyaagee i oonee?" yaagidi oichchiis.

English Sentences: And the people answered him after this manner, saying, So shall it be done to the man that killeth him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Oichchin eti a, "Ha bitaniyaa woriya urau hagee hagee oosettana" yaagidi kaseegaadankka ayyo zaaridosona.

English Sentences: And Eliab his eldest brother heard when he spake unto the men; and Eliab's anger was kindled against David, and he said, Why camest thou down hither? and with whom hast thou left those few sheep in the wilderness? I know thy pride, and the naughtiness of thine heart; for thou art come down that thou mightest see the battle.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti asaara haasayiyoogaa a ishai ubbaappe bairai Eli7aabi siyidi, Daawita bolli hanqquwaa eexxi kiyiis; eexxi kiyidi, "Neeni ha sohuwaa aibissi yaadii? He amarida dorssata bazzon oonaara yeggadii? Ne otoruwaanne ne wozanaa iitatettaa taani erais; neeni olaa be7anau yaadasa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And David said, What have I now done? Is there not a cause?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Daawiti, "Taani ha77i ai oottidanaa? Harai attikko haasayanaukka danddayikkinaa?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he turned from him toward another, and spake after the same manner: and the people answered him again after the former manner.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti ba ishaa aggidi, hara asaakko simmidi, kaseegaadankka oichchiis; oichchin asai ayyo kaseegaadankka zaariis.

English Sentences: And when the words were heard which David spake, they rehearsed them before Saul: and he sent for him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti haasayidoogaa siyida asati Saa7oolayyo yootidosona; yootin Saa7ooli Daawita xeesissiis.

English Sentences: And David said to Saul, Let no man's heart fail because of him; thy servant will go and fight with this Philistine.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti Saa7oola, "Ha bitaniyaa gaasuwan o wozanaikka maashoppo; taani ne ashkkarai baada, ha Pilisxxeemiyaara olettana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Saul said to David, Thou art not able to go against this Philistine to fight with him: for thou art but a youth, and he a man of war from his youth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Saa7ooli Daawita, "Ha Pilisxxeemiyaara neeni olettanau danddayakka; aissi giikko, neeni na7a; shin naatettaappe doommidi, i olettiiddi diccida asa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And David said unto Saul, Thy servant kept his father's sheep, and there came a lion, and a bear, and took a lamb out of the flock:
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Daawiti Saa7oola, "Taani ne ashkkarai ta aawaa dorssata heemmais; gaammoi woikko beere giyo do7ai yiidi wudiyaappe dorssaa oiqqiyo wode,

English Sentences: And I went out after him, and smote him, and delivered it out of his mouth: and when he arose against me, I caught him by his beard, and smote him, and slew him.
Wolaitta Sentences: a kaallada taani baada a doonaappe wotta ekkais; taakko simmiyo wode, buuchchaa oiqqada, shoca worais.

English Sentences: Thy servant slew both the lion and the bear: and this uncircumcised Philistine shall be as one of them, seeing he hath defied the armies of the living God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ne ashkkarai gaammuwaanne beeriyaa woraas; ha qaxxarettibeenna Pilisxxeemee de7o Xoossaa olanchchata naassido gishshau, ikka etappe issuwaadan hanana.

English Sentences: David said moreover, The LORD that delivered me out of the paw of the lion, and out of the paw of the bear, he will deliver me out of the hand of this Philistine. And Saul said unto David, Go, and the LORD be with thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gaammuwaanne beeriyaa xugunttaappe tana ashshida GODAI ha Pilisxxeemiyaa kushiyaappekka ashshana" yaagiis. Saa7ooli Daawita, "Ba; Xoossai nenaara gido" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Saul armed David with his armour, and he put an helmet of brass upon his head; also he armed him with a coat of mail.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Saa7ooli ba maayuwaa Daawita maizziis; Daawita huuphiyan nahaase birataa qophiyaa wottiis; nahaase birataa kootiyaakka Daawita maizziis.

English Sentences: And David girded his sword upon his armour, and he assayed to go; for he had not proved it. And David said unto Saul, I cannot go with these; for I have not proved them. And David put them off him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti ba ola maayuwaa bolli bisuwaa gixxiis; gixxidi hemetti be7iis; shin danddayibeenna; aissi giikko, hegaa malaa maayuwaa maayi erenna. Hegaappe guyyiyan, Daawiti Saa7oola, "Taani hagaa mala maayuwaa maayada meezetabeenna gishshau, hagaara baanau danddayikke" yaagidi ola maayuwaa ubbaara qaariis.

English Sentences: And he took his staff in his hand, and chose him five smooth stones out of the brook, and put them in a shepherd's bag which he had, even in a scrip; and his sling was in his hand: and he drew near to the Philistine.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti ba hentta gatimaa oiqqidi, shaafaappe muila shuchcha ichchashata maxi ekkidi, ba qarcciitan yeggiis; ba yambbarshshaa oiqqidi, Gooliyaadakko matiis.

English Sentences: And the Philistine came on and drew near unto David; and the man that bare the shield went before him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gooliyaadikka Daawitakko shiiqi shiiqidi matattiis; gonddalliyaa tookkiya bitanee a sinttan de7ees.

English Sentences: And when the Philistine looked about, and saw David, he disdained him: for he was but a youth, and ruddy, and of a fair countenance.
Wolaitta Sentences: I Daawita tishshi ootti xeellidi, Daawiti na7a gididoogaanne meraa lo77onne arssa gididoogaa be7idi kariis.

English Sentences: And the Philistine said unto David, Am I a dog, that thou comest to me with staves? And the Philistine cursed David by his gods.
Wolaitta Sentences: Karidi Daawita, "Neeni gatimaa oiqqada ta bolli yaanau, tana kana gaadiiyye?" yaagiis; yaagidi ba xoossatu sunttan Daawita qanggiis.

English Sentences: And the Philistine said to David, Come to me, and I will give thy flesh unto the fowls of the air, and to the beasts of the field.
Wolaitta Sentences: I qassikka Daawita, "Haaya; taani ne ashuwaa saluwaa kafotussinne sa7aa do7atussi immana" yaagiis.
